com.phunware.mapping

Class PwMappingModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • MappingModule
      • com.phunware.mapping.PwMappingModule

  • public final class PwMappingModule
extends MappingModule
    Retrieves an instance of the PwMappingModule to install into the MaaS Core session.
    See Also:
    PwCoreSession.installModules(com.phunware.core.CoreModule...)

        public static PwMappingModule getInstance()
        Retrieves an instance of the PwCMSModule to install into the MaaS Core session.
        Returns:
        a PwCMSModule instance
        See Also:

      • getBuildingData

        public void getBuildingData(android.content.Context context,
                   long buildingId,
                   PwOnBuildingDataListener onBuildingDataListener)
        Retrieves all building data (building, floors, and floor resources) for an ID in a background thread. The result is returned in the callback listener.
        Parameters:
        context - current context
        buildingId - Building ID to get data for
        onBuildingDataListener - listener to receive result

      • getPOIs

        public void getPOIs(android.content.Context context,
           long buildingId,
           PwOnPOIDataListener onPOIDataListener)
        Retrieves all Points of Interest for a building by its ID in a background thread. The result is returned in the callback listener.
        Parameters:
        context - current context
        buildingId - Building ID to get data for
        onPOIDataListener - listener to receive result

        Retrieves all Points for a building by its ID in a background thread. The result is returned in the callback listener.
        Parameters:
        context - current context
        buildingId - Building ID to get data for
        onPOIDataListener - listener to receive result

      • getRouteInBackground

        public void getRouteInBackground(android.content.Context context,
                        long startPointId,
                        long endPointId,
                        PwRouteCallback pwRouteCallback)
        Retrieves a PwRoute between two PwPoints based on the Point IDs. This doesn't look for handicap-accessible routes.
        Parameters:
        context - current context
        startPointId - starting Point ID
        endPointId - ending Point ID
        pwRouteCallback - callback to receive data

      • getRouteInBackground

        public void getRouteInBackground(android.content.Context context,
                        long startPointId,
                        long endPointId,
                        PwRouteCallback pwRouteCallback,
                        boolean isAccessible)
        Retrieves a PwRoute between two PwPoints based on the Point IDs.
        Parameters:
        context - current context
        startPointId - starting Point ID
        endPointId - ending Point ID
        isAccessible - flag to find a route that is handicap accessible (if this is set to true, then only accessible routes are returned)
        pwRouteCallback - callback to receive data

      • getRoute

        public java.util.List<PwRoute> getRoute(android.content.Context context,
                               long startPointId,
                               long endPointId)
                                 throws com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException
        Retrieves a PwRoute between two PwPoints based on the Point IDs. This doesn't look for handicap-accessible routes. This should be called in a background thread.
        Parameters:
        context - current context
        startPointId - starting Point ID
        endPointId - ending Point ID
        Returns:
        non-null PwRoute if there are no errors
        Throws:
        com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException - thrown if there is an error getting the route data
        See Also:
        getRouteInBackground(android.content.Context, long, long, PwRouteCallback, boolean)

      • getRoute

        public java.util.List<PwRoute> getRoute(android.content.Context context,
                               long startPointId,
                               long endPointId,
                               boolean isAccessible)
                                 throws com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException
        Retrieves a PwRoute between two PwPoints based on the Point Ids. This should be called in a background thread.
        Parameters:
        context - current context
        startPointId - starting Point ID
        endPointId - ending Point ID
        isAccessible - flag to find a route that is handicap accessible (if this is set to true, then only accessible routes are returned)
        Returns:
        non-null PwRoute if there are no errors
        Throws:
        com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException - thrown if there is an error getting the route data
        See Also:
        getRouteInBackground(android.content.Context, long, long, PwRouteCallback, boolean)

      • getRouteFromLocation

        public java.util.List<PwRoute> getRouteFromLocation(android.content.Context context,
                                           long floorId,
                                           LatLng startLatLng,
                                           long endPointId,
                                           boolean isAccessible)
                                             throws com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException
        Retrieves a PwRoute from a location (lat/lon start coordinates) to a point. This should be called in a background thread.
        Parameters:
        context - current context
        floorId - starting Floor ID
        startLatLng - starting LatLng coordinate
        endPointId - ending Point ID
        isAccessible - flag to find a route that is handicap accessible (if this is set to true, then only accessible routes are returned)
        Returns:
        Non-null PwRoute if there are no errors
        Throws:
        com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException - thrown if there is an error getting the route data

      • getRouteFromLocationInBackground

        public void getRouteFromLocationInBackground(android.content.Context context,
                                    long floorId,
                                    LatLng startLatLng,
                                    long endPointId,
                                    boolean isAccessible,
                                    PwRouteCallback pwRouteCallback)
        Retrieves a PwRoute from a location (lat/lon start coordinates) to a point. This is called in a background thread.
        Parameters:
        context - current context
        floorId - starting Floor ID
        startLatLng - starting LatLng coordinate
        endPointId - ending Point ID
        pwRouteCallback - callback to receive data
        isAccessible - flag to find a route that is handicap accessible (if this is set to true then only accessible routes are returned)

      • getRouteFromLocationInBackground

        public java.util.List<PwRoute> getRouteFromLocationInBackground(android.content.Context context,
                                                       long floorId,
                                                       LatLng startLatLng,
                                                       long endPointId)
                                                         throws com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException
        Retrieves a PwRoute from a location (lat/lon start coordinates) to a point. This should be called in a background thread. This doesn't look for handicap-accessible routes.
        Parameters:
        context - current context
        floorId - starting Floor ID
        startLatLng - starting LatLng coordinate
        endPointId - ending Point ID
        Returns:
        Non-null PwRoute if there are no errors
        Throws:
        com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException - thrown if there is an error getting the route data

        Parameters:
        context - current context
        url - svg image url
        pwOnSvgDownloadCallback - callback to receive data
